title: 3 fingers or 4?
body: is it better to use 4 fingers? since i started this game 1 year and a few months ago i always used 3 fingers would it be better to relearn league with 4 fingers?

replies.body: i like keeping my pinky on my caps lock key to flame more efficiently
Fuck it, i broke mine last week{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Depends on what you're mor cmfortable with.
I prefer 3 fingers on Q+W+E/R, the pinky on caps for lvl up short keys and strg  as self target, and my thump on space for trinket.

But agian, shortkeys and how you use you're fingers is totally up to you and what feels natural/confortable to you.

Doesn't really matter, I use 3 fingers cause I'm afraid I'll press my R via mistake if my fingers get lazy or something (fat bingers, sensitive keyboard). And either you're using that finger to R a shred of a second faster, or you're using it to actively use tab and see the scoreboard, so they're both of equal importance really.
Both work fine. Using 3 fingers might slow APM by 0.1 seconds
It depends how your used to playing, i have my pinky on shift to level up my abilities, and give me better clone control when i play shaco(otp btw)
